text: James Powers Moody (September 2, 1935 â€“ March 22, 2019) was an American economist and Democratic politician. He was born in Richlands, Virginia. Moody was a member of the United States House of Representatives, representing Milwaukee, Wisconsin from 1983 to 1993.Wisconsin Historical Society. Dictionary of Wisconsin History , "Term: Moody, Jim 1935". Moody died at a hospital in Maryland on March 22, 2019 at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jim Moody, Wisconsin Historical Society * Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American economists Category:United States representatives from Wisconsin Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Politicians from Milwaukee Category:Lawyers from Milwaukee Category:Lawyers from Virginia
